general.question: What is BookCompass?
general.answer: BookCompass is an AI-powered book recommendation platform that helps you discover your next great read based on your interests, reading history, and community recommendations.

general.question: Is BookCompass free to use?
general.answer: Yes, BookCompass is free to use. You can access book recommendations, create reading lists, and participate in community discussions without any charge.

general.question: How does the recommendation system work?
general.answer: Our AI system analyzes your reading preferences, favorite genres, authors you enjoy, and combines this with community ratings to suggest books you're likely to enjoy.

recommendations.question: How can I get better book recommendations?
recommendations.answer: To get better recommendations: 1) Rate more books, 2) Add books to your reading list, 3) Specify your favorite genres and authors, 4) Provide feedback on recommendations.

recommendations.question: Can I get recommendations for specific genres?
recommendations.answer: Yes! You can filter recommendations by genre, mood, length, or complexity level. Just specify your preferences in the recommendation settings.

community.question: How can I contribute to the community?
community.answer: You can contribute by writing book reviews, participating in discussions, creating reading lists, and helping other members find their next great read.

community.question: Are there reading groups I can join?
community.answer: Yes, you can join or create reading groups based on genres, authors, or specific books. Groups can organize reading schedules and discussions.

technical.question: How do I reset my password?
technical.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email address, and follow the instructions sent to your email to reset your password.

technical.question: Can I sync my reading list across devices?
technical.answer: Yes, your reading list and preferences automatically sync across all devices when you're logged into your account.
